prompt.description: Text prompt for video generation, max 2000 characters
examples: The astronaut waved and the camera moved up.
prompt.title: Prompt

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds (1-16 for Q3 models)

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.description: Output video resolution. Note: 360p is not available when end_image_url is provided.

image_url.title: Image Url
image_url.description: URL or base64 image to use as the starting frame

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. If None, a random seed is chosen.

end_image_url.title: End Image Url
end_image_url.description: URL of the image to use as the ending frame. When provided, generates a transition video between start and end frames.

audio.title: Audio
audio.description: Whether to use direct audio-video generation. When true, outputs video with sound (including dialogue and sound effects).

video.title: Video
video.description: The generated video from image using the Q3 model

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
